input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports Field Military Flieger Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Automatic Men's Tsuyosa Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Pacific Boxers Minimalist Three-Hand Smoke Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Dalton Three-Hand Silicone Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's 50m Date Battery Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Bronson Automatic Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Satellite Wave Silicone Watch Cc3005-18e'
  - Name='Men's Fossil Unisex Fenmore Multifunction Two-tone Stainless Steel Watch Set BQ2900SET'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Watch Eco-Drive Sport AW0050-82E'
  - Name='Watch Women's Chronograph Fossil'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Weekender Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Houston Astros Minimalist Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Chandler Men's Citizen Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco Drive Full Size Wrist Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's USC Trojans Eco-Drive Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Rider Broncs Minimalist Slim Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Eco-Drive Calendrier Moonphase Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Pro Trek Triple Solar Sensor Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Chronograph Avion'
  - Name='Seiko Watch 110th Anniversary Limited Edition SRPK41'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Oklahoma Sooners Machine Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Women's Penny Three-Hand'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Japanese Eco-Drive Watch with Leather Strap'
  - Name='Fossil Women's Eevie Two-Tone Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Women's Laney Two-Tone Stainless Steel Watch'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports Field Military Flieger Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a sports field watch with military style and automatic movement, similar in function and rugged style to the Timex Expedition Scout, though it likely uses stainless steel rather than titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Automatic Men's Tsuyosa Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic movement and robust design align somewhat with expedition functionality, but reduced similarity due to unknown durability features and material compared to titanium case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Pacific Boxers Minimalist Three-Hand Smoke Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Minimalist design and likely less rugged or specialized features compared to expedition model; more fashion oriented.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Dalton Three-Hand Silicone Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Silicone band and likely casual style reduces similarity though three-hand functionality somewhat aligns with reference watch's everyday use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's 50m Date Battery Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Basic watch with date and battery powered, but only 50m water resistance and unspecified durability features make it less comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Bronson Automatic Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic movement and stainless steel construction offer some functional similarity, but likely heavier and lacks titanium and expedition-specific durability features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Satellite Wave Silicone Watch Cc3005-18e
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eco-Drive solar-powered movement and satellite timekeeping are advanced features, contemporarily matching functionality, but silicone band and possibly less rugged build diverge.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Fossil Unisex Fenmore Multifunction Two-tone Stainless Steel Watch Set BQ2900SET
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Multifunction watch in stainless steel is less focused on rugged or expedition features, more fashion-oriented.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Watch Eco-Drive Sport AW0050-82E
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sport-oriented, Eco-Drive powered watch likely shares many functional and durability traits with the Timex expedition model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Watch Women's Chronograph Fossil
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's chronograph focused more on style and chronograph functions, less on rugged outdoor durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Weekender Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Weekender style is casual and versatile with chronograph features, somewhat similar in functionality and usage scenarios but less rugged than expedition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Houston Astros Minimalist Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Minimalist stainless steel design geared for style or casual wear, lacks rugged features of the expedition watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Chandler Men's Citizen Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen Chandler series typically has field watch style with durable features, aligning closely with expedition style and functional use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco Drive Full Size Wrist Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eco-Drive and full size suggest durability and reliability, but lack of specific rugged or field features reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's USC Trojans Eco-Drive Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sports-themed design and stainless steel construction are less about rugged outdoor use, more casual or fan oriented.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Rider Broncs Minimalist Slim Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim, minimalist design in stainless steel is more fashion than function for rugged or adventure use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Eco-Drive Calendrier Moonphase Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Moonphase complication adds style and complexity, but does not align closely with rugged expedition watch focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Pro Trek Triple Solar Sensor Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly functional, rugged outdoor watch with solar power and multiple sensors, very close in purpose and durability to the Timex expedition model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Chronograph Avion
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chronograph and Eco-Drive features support some functional similarity, but likely more aviation style than rugged field use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Watch 110th Anniversary Limited Edition SRPK41
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a collector's edition with automatic movement; functionally similar but possibly less rugged and lightweight than titanium expedition model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Oklahoma Sooners Machine Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Team-branded watch in stainless steel is more for casual or fan use rather than rugged outdoor functionality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Women's Penny Three-Hand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's three-hand watch typically leans towards fashion, lacks expedition or rugged characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Japanese Eco-Drive Watch with Leather Strap
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eco-Drive with leather strap shares similar materials and power technology; likely comparable in durability and everyday wearability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Women's Eevie Two-Tone Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fashion oriented women's stainless steel watch, not focused on rugged outdoor or expedition features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Women's Laney Two-Tone Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above, style focused without emphasis on features matching rugged field watches.
